title: Comparative performance analysis of global and chinese-domain large language models for myopia
details: Z Jiang, Y Xu, ZW Lim, Z Wang, Y Han, SME Yew… - Eye, 2025
abstract: Background The performance of global large language models (LLMs), trained largely on Western data, for disease in other settings and languages is unknown. Taking myopia as an illustration, we evaluated the global versus Chinese-domain …

title: SynthFM: Training Modality-agnostic Foundation Models for Medical Image Segmentation without Real Medical Data
details: S Sengupta, S Chakrabarty, KS Ravi, G Avinash… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Foundation models like the Segment Anything Model (SAM) excel in zero-shot segmentation for natural images but struggle with medical image segmentation due to differences in texture, contrast, and noise. Annotating medical images is costly and …
